userTask.name: Onsite visit and case resolution
userTask.description: This task is for the field technician for analysis and resolution of the case. The technician should provide a resolution note which will be sent to the customer via email or twitter direct message based on the case source (logged via web or twitter)

userTask.name: Schedule onsite visit
userTask.description: This task is to help schedule an onsite visit to the customer's location by a field technician. On completion of this, a calendar event will be automatically created in the onsite support team calendar
